shopPermission.description: A model that links the user and shop records (hasManyThrough relationship). This link is used in tenancy to determine which shops a user has access to.

verifyConnections.description: Checks the current session to see if a new shopPermission record needs to be created.

webflow.title: Standalone Shopify app with Gadget auth
webflow.description: Write a non-embedded app with Gadget managed Shopify auth.
